title: Alumnus Makes a Donation
description: An alumnus calls the development office to make a credit card donation to their former department.

tasks.description: Identify the alumnus in the alumni database.
Confirm the donation amount and the designation (e.g., 'Chemistry Department Fund').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the details of the donation.

tasks.description: Securely process the credit card donation through the university's payment gateway.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the payment and provides a confirmation number.
